item.title: Turning the backlight of the official Raspberry Pi Touch Screen on or off
item.description: I’ve setup a https://magicmirror.builders to have some information handy when leaving my apartment. I’m using a [https://www.raspberrypi.org/](Rasspberry Pi) with the official [https://www.raspberrypi.org/products/raspberry-pi-touch-display/](Raspberry Pi Touch Display). However I don’t want to have the display backlight turned on all the time. Especially at night the backlight is rather annoying. In Addition I don’t see why I should use up energy when nobody is looking at the screen.
